bibl.title: Continuation and Changes in Umayyad Egypt as Reflected in the Terms and Titles of the Greek Papyri.
bibl.note: In early Arab Egypt, a large number of terms in the Greek papyri continued to be used for about a century (continuation of old traditions and expression of new functions).

bibl.title: Second and Third International Congress on Greek and Arabic Studies, Delphi 1985 and Athens 1988

bibl.seg: CHRISTIDES V., Continuation and Changes in Umayyad Egypt as Reflected in the Terms and Titles of the Greek Papyri.
Second and Third International Congress on Greek and Arabic Studies, Delphi 1985 and Athens 1988 = Graeco-Arabica 4 (1991) pp. 53-63, 2 figg.
In early Arab Egypt, a large number of terms in the Greek papyri continued to be used for about a century (continuation of old traditions and expression of new functions).
